Title: Ghostbusters
Plot: Peter Venkman, Ray Stantz and Egon Spengler work at Columbia University. where they delve into the paranormal and fiddle with many unethical experiments on their students. As they are kicked out of the University, they really understand the paranormal and go into business for themselves. Under the new snazzy business name of 'Ghostbusters', and living in the old firehouse building they work out of, they are called to rid New York City of paranormal phenomenon at everyone's whim. - for a price. They make national press as the media reports the Ghostbusters are the cause of it all. Thrown in jail by the EPA, the mayor takes a chance and calls on them to help save the city. Unbeknownst to all, a long dead Gozer worshiper (Evo Shandor) erected a downtown apartment building which is the cause of all the paranormal activity. They find out the building could resurrect the ancient Hittite god, Gozer, and bring an end to all of humanity. Who are you gonna call to stop this terrible ...
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 6 nominations.
Writers: Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Rick Moranis
Stars: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis
Companies: Columbia Pictures, Delphi Films, Black Rhino Productions
Tagline: No spook, specter, or haunt will ever be safe again.

Similars.Title: Ghostbusters II
Similars.Plot: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.
Similars.Stars: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver

Similars.Title: Gremlins
Similars.Plot: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.
Similars.Stars: Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, Hoyt Axton

Similars.Title: Beetlejuice
Similars.Plot: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.
Similars.Stars: Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, Michael Keaton

Similars.Title: Batman
Similars.Plot: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.
Similars.Stars: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger

Similars.Title: Ghostbusters
Similars.Plot: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.
Similars.Stars: Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon

Similars.Title: Batman Returns
Similars.Plot: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.
Similars.Stars: Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito, Michelle Pfeiffer

Similars.Title: Groundhog Day
Similars.Plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.
Similars.Stars: Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott

Similars.Title: Edward Scissorhands
Similars.Plot: An artificial man, who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands, leads a solitary life. Then one day, a suburban lady meets him and introduces him to her world.
Similars.Stars: Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest

Similars.Title: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
Similars.Plot: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken control of a New York City media mogul's high-tech skyscraper.
Similars.Stars: Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, John Glover

Similars.Title: Jaws
Similars.Plot: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.
Similars.Stars: Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss

Similars.Title: Back to the Future Part II
Similars.FullTitle: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
Similars.Plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.
Similars.Stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson

Similars.Title: Back to the Future Part III
Similars.FullTitle: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
Similars.Plot: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.
Similars.Stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen
